Table: 1
CRUSHINGS
Canadian canola crushings in April 2013 were 577.8
thousand tonnes, down 3% from the March 2013 crush of
593.0 thousand tonnes. In April 2013, 252.3 thousand
tonnes of canola oil and 341.1 thousand tonnes of canola
meal were produced. Canola crushings in Jan-Apr were
2 259.6 thousand tonnes , down 10% from the 2 510.3
thousand tonnes crushed in Jan-Apr 2012. Total canola
crushings for the 2012/13 crop year to the end of Apr 2013
were 5 292.1 thousand tonnes, down 2% from the previous
year.

'000 tonnes thousand tonnes, accounting for 49% of total exports.
